# Inception

This project aims to broaden your knowledge of system administration by using Docker.
You will virtualize several Docker images, creating them in your new personal virtual
machine. you need to Set up a small infrastructure composed of WordPress with LEMP Stack (Nginx, MariaDB and PHP) using Docker / Docker-Compose under specific rules.

read the [subject](https://cdn.intra.42.fr/pdf/pdf/69512/en.subject.pdf) for more infrmetion.

## Environment

- MacOS 11.4(Big Sur, Intel)

Developed and tested in this environment.

## Compile

To compile , run the lines below.

```shell
$ git clone https://github.com/moelazhari/inception.git
$ cd inception
$ make
```
## Execute

type in the taype in your browser https://localhost/

## how to stop
```
$ make clean
```
